comment: As a real DV/SA survivor unlike people like Amber who fake it to defame people she abused to further abuse them. I am signing this petition in hopes that all of us survivors will have a real voice up there against Amber and people like her. I watched the whole trail, saw all the evidence including the evidence they couldn't include because of people being now deceased so they were unable to take the stand. For example the most damning evidence "the Australia audio tape" I could hear and see my abusers in Amber and her actions, words, and horrible acting on stand and off. When you have really gone through that in life you recognize abusers and takers. It's like a 6th sense. There is no denying it and #amberhearddoesntspeakforme.
commentable_entity.ask: Have a Domestic Violence Survivor on MSM to dispute Amber Heard
commentable_entity.title: Have a Domestic Violence Survivor on MSM to dispute Amber Heard
commentable_entity.description: As you know, there are millions of Domestic Violence & Sexual Violence who are either currently victims, or have escaped their situation and are survivors. Warriors, really. However, Ms. Heard's team has been mocking us, insulting us, calling us trolls or paid shills, even Eve Barlow called us "freaks." Why? Because the survivorship community has been trying to set the record straight with our own experiences! To us, Ms. Heard did NOT come off as a victim, but an abuser that we ALL recognized! She effectively weaponized the MeToo movement to extort a generous caring man, and NONE of us appreciate it. We need GENUINE survivors to be interviewed via MSM outlets to show that we are NOTHING that Amber's camp is accusing us of, and we hold a unique perspective on the matter. Instead of insulting and mocking us, she needs to LISTEN to us instead of sweeping us under the rug in a very unflattering way. She does NOT speak for us. While I'm familiar with cameras and studio settings, and would be willing to go live, there are others who need to be heard as well. We are all proud of Mr. Depp for sharing the truth, because we know how private he is and we know the aggressor/victim dynamic as we are all HYPER aware. Take this into consideration and find me @MidniteRavyn on Twitter. I'll be more than happy to share, as will others.
